abstract: Pakistan Supreme Court suspends death sentences of six militants after questions arise over whether prisoners were provided with fair hearing under military courts.
lead_paragraph: A petition by a rights activist and lawyer challenged trials by the military courts and questioned whether prisoners were tried fairly.

headline.main: Pakistani Justices Suspend Executions Ordered by Military Courts
headline.print_headline: Executions Ordered by Pakistani Military Courts Are Halted

snippet: A petition by a rights activist and lawyer challenged trials by the military courts and questioned whether prisoners were tried fairly.
